__e: “If my people will not submit, I am forced to let go the arm of my Son”.
Must you tell them everything that goes on in the bedroom?
That I should be forced to make way for her, and see her take my place!
Did he strike you? Did he hurt you? Did he make you do something you didn't want to?
I don't plan on doing this for long.
So... I disciplined myself to play the cards that life dealt me.
- Didn't you do it at your will?
He forced me to follow him to his room.
Is that where he, uh... forced himself on you?
I don't plan on doing this for long.
